author: Ted Byrne
content:
These are all intriguing. While I like all of them and would have commented upon each were they submitted individually, this grouping seems to demand that I find a favorite. Okay... the little guy... he makes me smile. I like to smile. It's been a tough day... we are on quadruple deadline, Rita had a spill on the steps (she's okay, but very stiff and bruised), so... a smile's a nice way to end the day. Thanks...

Ted
